name: Fédération européenne et internationale des Patrons Prothésistes dentaires
goal: The purpose of FEPPD as a non-profit organisation is notably: (i) to represent, promote and participate with other organisations in areas that may affect the professional and commercial interests of the independent (self-employed) dental technicians and dental laboratory owners on European and International levels, (i) to protect and respect the national characteristics of the vocational practice, if these have a legal base in the respective country of the member, (iii) to maintain and develop relations between associations representing those working in dental laboratories, dental surgeries and the dental trade in the spirit of collaboration and mutual understanding, (iv) to represent FEPPD with International and European organisations and national governments and organisations, (v) to develop the training and education of laboratory owners, independent dental technicians (self-employed), and dental technicians employed by dental laboratories.
interests: Consumer Affairs, Customs, Education, Enlargement, Enterprise, Internal Market, Public Health, Research and Technology, Taxation
euInitiatives: FEPPD participates in the Medical Device Expert Group, GHTF-forum and CEN TC55 working group. FEPPD follows the revision of the medical device directive and related policy fields.
